scripts.build:css:site: lessc less/site.less > dist/css/site.css && uglifycss --output dist/css/site.css dist/css/site.css && postcss dist/css/site.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -o dist/css/site.css
scripts.build:css:theme_usgs: lessc less/usgs_theme/custom.less > dist/css/nwis_qw_custom.css && uglifycss --output dist/css/nwis_qw_custom.css dist/css/nwis_qw_custom.css && postcss dist/css/nwis_qw_custom.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -o dist/css/nwis_qw_custom.css
scripts.build:css:wqp_theme: lessc less/wqp_theme/custom.less > dist/css/custom.css && uglifycss --output dist/css/custom.css dist/css/custom.css && postcss dist/css/custom.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -o dist/css/custom.css
scripts.build:css:vendor: lessc less/vendor.less > dist/css/vendor.css && uglifycss --output dist/css/vendor.css dist/css/vendor.css && postcss dist/css/vendor.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -o dist/css/vendor.css
